FlowNode.ExtendedProperty:
ZoneType=0;ScriptContent=error = None begin_time = now() # call_map = _gd_['call_map'] # chan => call_info conf_map = _gd_['conf_map'] # res_id => call_info call_map_r = _gd_['call_map_r'] # res_id => call_info conf_map_r = _gd_['conf_map_r'] # res_id -> conf_info # call_info = call_map_r[res_id] chan = call_info['chan'] # org_state = call_info['state'] call_info['answer_time'] = now() call_info['state'] = 'Answer' # SendAcceptCall(chan) ret_val = AsynchInvoke(WaitCallStatus(chan, 5000, 0, [2, 3, 4])) if ret_val[0] < 1: error = RuntimeError('WaitCallStatus(status=1xx) returns error value %s, %s' % ret_val) raise error if ret_val[0] == 2: SendANS(chan, 1) ret_val = AsynchInvoke(WaitCallStatus(chan, 5000, 0, [3,4])) if ret_val[0] < 1: error = RuntimeError('WaitCallStatus(states=2xx) returns error value %s, %s' % ret_val) raise error
try: # set cdr info cdr_datas = [ str(res_id), params.get('user_data'), None, None, None, ] SetCdrAdditionalInfo(chan, *cdr_datas) # Answer OK!!! call_info['state'] = 'Idle' # return ! jsonrpc.send_event( method='call.on_answer_completed', params={ 'res_id': res_id, 'error': None, 'begin_time': begin_time, 'end_time': now(), 'user_data': call_info['params'].get('user_data'), } ) except IvrError as err: error = err TraceErr(err)
